question: Q1
description: In the last month, how often has Sandy been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly?

question: Q2
description: In the last month, how often has Sandy felt that she was unable to control the important things in her life?

question: Q3
description: In the last month, how often has Sandy felt nervous and stressed?

question: Q4
description: In the last month, how often has Sandy felt confident about her ability to handle her personal problems?

question: Q5
description: In the last month, how often has Sandy felt that things were going her way?

question: Q6
description: In the last month, how often has Sandy found that she could not cope with all the things that she had to do?

question: Q7
description: In the last month, how often has Sandy been able to control irritations in her life?

question: Q8
description: In the last month, how often has Sandy felt that she was on top of things?

question: Q9
description: In the last month, how often has Sandy been angered because of things that happened that were outside of her control?

question: Q10
description: In the last month, how often has Sandy felt difficulties were piling up so high that she could not overcome them?
